attributes.action: Start a petition supporting free speech
attributes.additional_details:
Parliament must not allow us to lose free speech.

I might not agree with what you say, but I defend your right to say it.

The above statement is no longer true, people are cancelled because other people don't like what they say.

This is wrong Parliament must stand up for free speech.
attributes.background:
Free speech 

I want the Great British people to stand up to the cancel culture.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about freedom of speech, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
